snippet: The Workers’ Party will convene a conference on April 11, where the new leader, Kim Jong-un, is expected be anointed as the official head of the party.
abstract: North Korea's Workers’ Party will convene a conference on April 11, where new leader Kim Jong-un is expected to be anointed as the official head of the party.
lead_paragraph: The Workers’ Party will convene a conference on April 11, where the new leader, Kim Jong-un, is expected be anointed as the official head of the party.

headline.seo: North Korea Party Calls for Leadership Meeting
headline.main: North Korea Party Calls for Leadership Meeting
headline.print_headline: North Korea Party Calls For Leadership Meeting
